name: CGEventTapPlacement
desc: Constants that specify where a new event tap is inserted into the list of active event taps.

items.name: case headInsertEventTap
items.desc: Specifies that a new event tap should be inserted before any pre-existing event taps at the same location.

items.name: case tailAppendEventTap
items.desc: Specifies that a new event tap should be inserted after any pre-existing event taps at the same location.
